gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 96, Grizzlies 87
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pelicans defeated the Grizzlies, 96-87. Herbert Jones notched 17 points and nine rebounds for the Pelicans, while Brandon Ingram (16 points, six assists) and Zion Williamson (14 points, five rebounds, four assists) added a combined 30 points in the victory. Jaren Jackson Jr. tallied a game-high 22 points, along with six rebounds and three assists for the Grizzlies in the losing effort. The Pelicans have won back-to-back games as they improve to 32-22 on the season, while the Grizzlies fall to 18-36.
